stories.text: I tried Digital Ocean so far, but in order to save some money I want to be able to disable the VM for a night for example. But with DO you need to 1) create a snapshot 2) destroy the droplet 3) recreate the droplet (and choose the configuration (num of cores, ram, etc)) when you need the VM again. Tedious. What do you use? Thanks.
